verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses ע֣וֹד <WH5750> more נֶ֤גַע <WH5061> plague אֶחָד֙ <WH259> one אָבִ֤יא <WH935> Yet will I bring עַל־ <WH5921> on פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> [more] upon Pharaoh וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> and upon Egypt אַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> afterwards כֵ֕ן <WH3651> after that יְשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> he will let you go אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> here כְּשַׁ֨לְּח֔וֹ <WH7971> hence when he shall let [you] go כָּלָ֕ה <WH3617> hence altogether גָּרֵ֛שׁ <WH1644> he shall surely יְגָרֵ֥שׁ <WH1644> thrust you out אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> here

דַּבֶּר־ <WH1696> Speak נָ֖א <WH4994> now בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> now in the ears הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people וְיִשְׁאֲל֞וּ <WH7592> borrow אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <WH376> and let every man מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> רֵעֵ֗הוּ <WH7453> of his neighbour וְאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> and every woman מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> רְעוּתָ֔הּ <WH7468> of her neighbour כְּלֵי־ <WH3627> jewels כֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> of silver וּכְלֵ֥י <WH3627> and jewels זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> of gold

וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> gave יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> חֵ֥ן <WH2580> favour הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4713> Egyptian גַּ֣ם ׀ <WH1571> Furthermore הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> Moreover the man מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> Moses גָּד֤וֹל <WH1419> great מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> [was] very בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of the Egyptians בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight עַבְדֵֽי־ <WH5650> servants פַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh's וּבְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> and in the sight הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כַּחֲצֹ֣ת <WH2676> mid הַלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> night אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יוֹצֵ֖א <WH3318> will I go out בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> into the midst מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וּמֵ֣ת <WH4191> shall die כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בְּכוֹר֮ <WH1060> And all the firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> of Egypt מִבְּכ֤וֹר <WH1060> from the firstborn פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> of Pharaoh הַיֹּשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> that sitteth עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְא֔וֹ <WH3678> upon his throne עַ֚ד <WH5704> even בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> even unto the firstborn הַשִּׁפְחָ֔ה <WH8198> of the maidservant אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who אַחַ֣ר <WH310> that [is] behind הָרֵחָ֑יִם <WH7347> the mill וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all בְּכ֥וֹר <WH1060> and all the firstborn בְּהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> of beasts

וְהָֽיְתָ֛ה <WH1961> And there shall be צְעָקָ֥ה <WH6818> cry גְדֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> a great בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> before כָּמֹ֙הוּ֙ <WH3644> such לֹ֣א <WH3808> such as there was none נִהְיָ֔תָה <WH1961> been וְכָמֹ֖הוּ לֹ֥א <WH3808> like it nor תֹסִֽף׃ <WH3254> shall be like it any more

וּלְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> any בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> But against any of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יֶֽחֱרַץ־ <WH2782> move כֶּ֙לֶב֙ <WH3611> shall not a dog לְשֹׁנ֔וֹ <WH3956> his tongue לְמֵאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> against man וְעַד־ <WH5704> or בְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> or beast לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> that תֵּֽדְע֔וּן <WH3045> that ye may know אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> how יַפְלֶ֣ה <WH6395> doth put a difference יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> how that the LORD בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> between the Egyptians וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> and Israel

וְיָרְד֣וּ <WH3381> shall come down כָל־ <WH3605> All עֲבָדֶיךָ֩ <WH5650> And all these thy servants אֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> these אֵלַ֜י <WH413> to me וְהִשְׁתַּֽחֲוּוּ־ <WH7812> unto me and bow down לִ֣י לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> themselves unto me saying צֵ֤א <WH3318> Get thee out אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בְּרַגְלֶ֔יךָ <WH7272> that follow וְאַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> thee and after כֵ֖ן <WH3651> after that אֵצֵ֑א <WH3318> that I will go out וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> And he went out מֵֽעִם־ <WH5973> from פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> from Pharaoh בָּחֳרִי־ <WH2750> in a great אָֽף׃ <WH639> anger ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֹא־ <WH3808> will not יִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> shall not hearken אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH413> about פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh לְמַ֛עַן <WH4616> so רְב֥וֹת <WH7235> may be multiplied מוֹפְתַ֖י <WH4159> unto you that my wonders בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וּמֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> and Aaron עָשׂ֛וּ <WH6213> did אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמֹּפְתִ֥ים <WH4159> all these wonders הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before פַרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh וַיְחַזֵּ֤ק <WH2388> hardened יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> Pharaoh's וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not שִׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> go out אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> so that he would not let the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> of his land פ
